かちんと来る: (かちんとくる) - to be annoyed (by); to be offended (at); to be irritated (with)
かち割り: (かちわり) - crushed ice; chipped ice
かち割る: (かちわる) - to hit and break open; to crush; to smash
かち合う: (かちあう) - to clash; to be in conflict with
かっか: (かっかと) - burning hotly; burning redly
かっかと: (かっかと) - burning hotly; burning redly
かっきり: (かっきりに) - exactly/just/precisely; punctually; (かっきり only) clearly delineated (of boundaries, etc.)
かっきりに: (かっきりに) - exactly/just/precisely; punctually; (かっきり only) clearly delineated (of boundaries, etc.)
かっけー: (かっけー) - attractive; good-looking; stylish; cool
かっこ: (かっこ) - (from からころ)  geta; Japanese wooden clogs
かっこ可愛い: (かっこかわいい) - cool and cute; cool in a cute way; cute in a cool way
かっこ悪い: (かっこわるい) - unattractive; ugly; unstylish; uncool
かっちょいい: (カッチョイイ) - (adj-ix)   attractive; good-looking; stylish; cool; smooth; neat; with-it; groovy
かって出る: (かってでる) - to volunteer; to undertake a challenge
かっと: (かっと) - flaring up/burning hotly/suddenly becoming bright; flying into a rage/losing one's cool; opening suddenly and widely (e.g. eyes, mouth); acting resolutely
かっとなる: (かっとなる) - to flare up; to fly into a rage
かっぽう着: (かっぽうぎ) - coverall apron (esp. for cooking, cleaning, and household chores); cook's apron
かっぽれ: (かっぽれ) - kappore (traditional Japanese comic dance)
かっ血: (かっけつ) - lung hemorrhage; lung haemorrhage
かっ込む: (かっこむ) - to bolt one's food; to gulp down
かっ飛ばす: (かっとばす) - to knock out (e.g. homer); to slam; to send flying (e.g. a ball); to wallop (someone)
かつお味噌: (かつおみそ) - miso mixed with bonito
かつぎ出す: (かつぎだす) - to carry something out of a place; to elevate (someone) to a high position/to convince someone to accept a post (esp. through flattery); to mention something/to broach a topic/to bring up (a subject)/to raise (an issue)/to mention
かつ丼: (かつどん) - katsudon; pork cutlet served on top of a bowl of rice
かつ重: (かつじゅう) - pork cutlet on rice in a lacquered box
かつ飯: (かつめし) - cutlet and rice combo meal
かて: (かて) - (from か + とて) even if/if; though/despite; even
かてきょ: (かてきょ) - home tutor; private tutor; coach
かてて加えて: (かててくわえて) - moreover; besides; in addition; on top of; to make matters worse
かとみると: (かとみると) - (after past tense verb) no sooner than; as soon as; immediately after
かと思うと: (かとおもうと) - (after past tense verb) no sooner than/as soon as/immediately after; at the thought of/when I think about
かと言って: (かといって) - having said that; on the other hand
かどうか: (かどうか) - whether or not (in phrases like "I don't know whether or not I can come")
かな: (かなあ) - (at sentence end) I wonder; (at sentence end) should I?/is it?; (at sentence end) I wish that (with a negative)/I hope that
かなあ: (かなあ) - (at sentence end) I wonder; (at sentence end) should I?/is it?; (at sentence end) I wish that (with a negative)/I hope that
かなきり声: (かなきりごえ) - shrill voice; piercing cry; shriek; scream
かなぐり捨てる: (かなぐりすてる) - to fling off; to throw off; to throw to the winds
かなで合う: (かなであう) - to match; to harmonize with (also feelings, aroma, etc.)
かなにか: (かなにか) - (as Nか + なにか) or something
かな使い: (かなづかい) - kana orthography; syllabary spelling
かな入力: (かなにゅうりょく) - kana input
かな書き: (かながき) - writing in the kana
かな漢字変換: (かなかんじへんかん) - kana-kanji conversion (on a computer, etc.)
かな遣い: (かなづかい) - kana orthography; syllabary spelling
かに玉: (かにたま) - Chinese dish with fried egg and crab
かね: (かね) - interrogative sentence-ending particle expressing doubt
かのように: (かのように) - (usu. after verb) as if; as though
かの如くに: (かのごとくに) - (usu. after verb)  as if; as though
かばと: (かばと) - suddenly; all of a sudden; quickly; emphatically; energetically
かばん持ち: (かばんもち) - private secretary; flunky/someone who is always following around someone of high rank; someone who carries a bag for someone/luggage carrier/carrying a bag
かばん語: (かばんご) - portmanteau word; combination of two words (often first half of one, second half of another)
かば焼: (かばやき) - loach or eel dipped and broiled in soy-based sauce
かば焼き: (かばやき) - loach or eel dipped and broiled in soy-based sauce
かび止め: (かびどめ) - fungicide; preservative against mold; antimold agent
かび臭い: (かびくさい) - smelling of mold/musty/putrid; old-fashioned/stale/hackneyed/worn-out
かぴかぴ: (カピカピ) - crusty; flaky; dried out
かぶき者: (かぶきもの) - (yoji) dandy; peacock; early-17th-century equivalent of present-day yakuza; Edo-period eccentric who attracted public attention with their eye-catching clothes, peculiar hairstyle, and weird behavior
かぶせ茶: (かぶせちゃ) - kabusecha; mild green tea which has been lightly screened from sunlight for 1-3 weeks before picking
かぶと焼: (かぶとやき) - broiled fish head (esp. sea bream)
かぶと焼き: (かぶとやき) - broiled fish head (esp. sea bream)
かぶりを振る: (かぶりをふる) - to shake one's head (in denial)
かぶり付く: (かぶりつく) - to bite into/to sink one's teeth into; (かじりつく only)  to stick to/to cling to/to hold on to
かぶり笠: (かぶりがさ) - conical hat (East-Asian style); coolie hat
かぼちゃ野郎: (かぼちゃやろう) - man with an unattractive, unusually shaped face
かまくら: (kamakura) - festival de meados de janeiro no norte do Japão, com cabanas de neve nas quais as crianças brincam de casinha; cabana de neve
かます鰆: (カマスサワラ) - wahoo (species of fish, Acanthocybium solandri)
かませ犬: (かませいぬ) - foil; someone to look as if he's putting up a fight but actually have no chance of winning
かまって君: (かまってくん) - attention seeker; look-at-me
かまとろ: (かまとろ) - fatty tuna from around the collar bone
かま元: (かまもと) - pottery (i.e. the place); potter
かみのけ座: (かみのけざ) - {astron} Coma Berenices (constellation); the Berenice's Hair
かみ付く: (かみつく) - to bite (at); to snap at; to snarl at
かみ切る: (かみきる) - to bite off; to gnaw through
かみ合う: (かみあう) - to gear (engage) with/to be in gear (mesh); to bite each other
かみ合せ: (かみあわせ) - engaging or meshing (of gears); occlusion (of teeth)
かみ合わせ: (かみあわせ) - engaging or meshing (of gears); occlusion (of teeth)
かみ殺す: (かみこなす) - to chew; to digest
かみ砕く: (かみくだく) - to crunch/to masticate; to simplify/to explain plainly
かみ締める: (かみしめる) - to chew thoroughly/to bite (e.g. one's lip); to reflect upon/to digest
かも: (かも) - may; might; perhaps; may be; possibly
かもしれん: (かもしれん) - may; might; perhaps; may be; possibly
かもし出す: (かもしだす) - to engender; to bring about
かもね: (かもね) - (at sentence end)  maybe; could be; might
かもめーる: (かもメール) - (sometimes かもめ～る) summer greeting cards containing a lottery ticket, sold every year starting in June
かもメール: (かもメール) - (sometimes かもめ～る) summer greeting cards containing a lottery ticket, sold every year starting in June
かも知れない: (かもしれない) - may; might; perhaps; may be; possibly
